## Quaternion.toMatrix3x3() method

Convert this quaternion to a 3x3 rotation matrix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toMatrix3x3(matrix?: Matrix3x3): Matrix3x3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output matrix, if not specified, a new matrix will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md)

The output matrix.
